text: Nde nan kɨvntogi guari, nde mba bigi hɨr za mbuim, nde ntan rarga wari ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip, wari won ruru tɨvi gu bigi ganɨv, nde Fhe Bakɨme nɨman ŋgaravra kɨv, nde bigɨn thueŋ suaŋv simtɨk kɨrga fhu. Nde Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨv ndava bavira kɨri. Guma Bakɨme taagi zirɨrga tugar, Fhe Bakɨme nde ganɨnga, nde ndavi mbɨrarga.
